name.str_pl: copies of Lessons for the Novice Bowhunter

description: This hefty paperback book contains all the information needed for novice archers to get started hunting with a variety of bows and crossbows.

A book that highlights archery techniques from the point of view of the relationship between the anatomy of the human body and the anatomy of the bow.

name.str: Way of Archery: A 1637 Chinese Military Training Manual
name.str_pl: copies of Way of Archery: A 1637 Chinese Military Training Manual

variants.description: The Way of Archery provides a detailed introduction to practicing archery in the traditional Chinese military style.  It explains the basics of how to shoot using the Asian thumb ring, proper posture, training regimen, equipment, and avoiding pitfalls in shooting.

name.str: Zen and the Art of Archery

description: This massive book contains a wealth of vital information for the novice archer.

name.str_pl: copies of Beginner's Guide to Traditional Archery

variants.description: An easy-to-understand instruction manual for traditional archery.  Covers both target shooting and bow hunting.

name.str: The Theory And Practice Of Archery
name.str_pl: copies of The Theory And Practice Of Archery

variants.description: Authored by Horace Ford, the champion archer of England for the years 1850 to 1859 and 1867, and known as one of the greatest archers of all time, this book holds all of his experience in archery, which is still relevant by modern standards.

description: Will you be able to place the arrow right into the bullseye?  It is not that easy, but once you know how it's done, you will have a lot of fun with archery.

variants.description: Will you be able to place the arrow right into the bullseye?  It is not that easy, but once you know how it's done, you will have a lot of fun with archery.

"Become a more consistent and accurate archer!", The Archery Drill Book covers all aspects of the sport, with 130 of the best drills for developing superior technique, skill, physical stamina, and the focused mindset needed to shoot under pressure.

name.str_pl: copies of Archery from A to Z

variants.description: A beginner's guide to the equipment and shooting fundamentals that new shooters of all ages will benefit from.

"Anecdotes of Archery - From the Earliest Ages to the Year 1791" - This vintage book contains a comprehensive guide to archery, with historical details, information on archery in different cultures throughout the ages, anecdotes of notable events and battles, a glossary of archery terms, and much more.
